text: Cristina Garros Martínez was the first woman judge in the Court of Justice in Salta, Argentina, where she served from 2000 to 2012. Graciela Kauffman de Martinelli replaced her when she retired serving till February 2018. ==See also== * ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Argentine judges Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Argentine women judges Category:People from Salta Category:21st-century judges Category:21st- century Argentine women Category:21st-century women judges
title: Cristina Garros Martínez
